DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective evaluate effect 12 week subcutaneous evolocumab every 2 week every 4 week , compare placebo , percent change baseline low-density lipoprotein cholesterol ( LDL-C ) use addition statin therapy Japanese adult hypercholesterolemia high cardiovascular risk .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Tolerability Efficacy Evolocumab ( AMG 145 ) Japanese Subjects
DOC.criteria: Japanese adult , statin , without ezetimibe , stable dose ( ) least 4 week , fast LDLC great equal 115 mg/dL ( 3.0 mmol/L ) , fast triglyceride less equal 400 mg/dL ( 4.5 mmol/L ) ; Exclusion Criteria : New York Heart Association ( NYHA ) class III IV , poorly control hypertension , recently diagnose poorly control type 2 diabetes , last known leave ventricular ejection fraction < 30 % , myocardial infarction , unstable angina , percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) , coronary artery bypass graft ( CABG ) , stroke , plan cardiac surgery revascularization within 6 month randomization , uncontrolled cardiac arrhythmia .
DOC.keyword: Japanese , hypercholesterolemia , high risk cardiovascular event
